title: The treated waste water shall be used only for gardening, toilet flushing, landscape, irrigation, cooling towers, car washing, etc
clause_text: The treated waste water shall be used only for gardening, toilet flushing, landscape, irrigation, cooling towers, car washing, etc.and in no case for drinking, bathing, or washing clothes and utensils.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The treated waste water shall be used only for gardening, toilet flushing, landscape, irrigation, cooling towers, car washing, etc.and in no case for drinking, bathing, or washing clothes and utensils
